{"id":1017801885,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1691691487,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1017801885/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers II","memory":"71.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\nprivate:\n    ListNode* reverse(ListNode *head) {\n        ListNode *prevNode = NULL;\n        ListNode *currNode = head;\n        ListNode *nextNode = NULL;\n\n        while(currNode) {\n            nextNode = currNode -> next;\n            currNode -> next = prevNode;\n            prevNode = currNode;\n            currNode = nextNode;\n        }\n\n        return prevNode;\n    }\n\nListNode* add(ListNode *head1, ListNode *head2) {\n    int carry = 0;\n    ListNode *dummy = new ListNode(0);\n    ListNode *current = dummy;\n\n    while(head1 || head2 || carry) {\n        int sum = 0;\n\n        if(head1) {\n            sum += head1 -> val;\n            head1 = head1 -> next;\n        }\n\n        if(head2) {\n            sum += head2 -> val;\n            head2 = head2 -> next;\n        }\n\n        sum += carry;\n        carry = sum / 10;\n\n        ListNode *newNode = new ListNode(sum % 10);\n        current -> next = newNode;\n        current = current -> next;\n    }\n\n    return dummy -> next;\n}\n\n\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode *l1, ListNode *l2) {\n        ListNode *head1 = reverse(l1);\n        ListNode *head2 = reverse(l2);\n\n        return reverse(add(head1, head2));\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
